I would swap places with a famous chef so that I can learn how to cook like them and create my own signature dishes.
I would swap places with an astronaut so that I can experience weightlessness and explore space.
I would swap places with a superhero so that I can use their powers to help people in need.
I would swap places with a famous author so that I can write a best-selling book and become a published author.
I would swap places with a musician so that I can play instruments and sing like them and share my music with the world.
